title: Ground control to Major Trial
author: plam503711
aiHeadline: NASA's latest mission? Ground control to Major Trial, where even the legal system is out of this world.

title: A Research Preview of Codex
author: meetpateltech
aiHeadline: AI takes over the world... by writing code. Codex's research preview shows it's ready to replace developers, one line at a time.

title: Ollama's new engine for multimodal models
author: LorenDB
aiHeadline: Ollama's new engine: because one model wasn't enough, now it can handle everything from text to images, proving that multimodal models are the ultimate multitaskers.

title: BuyMeACoffee silently dropped support for many countries (2024)
author: beeburrt
aiHeadline: BuyMeACoffee: because supporting every country was just too easy, they've decided to drop support for many, proving that sometimes, less is just less.

title: After months of coding with LLMs, I'm going back to using my brain
author: a7fort
aiHeadline: After months of relying on AI, this developer has had an epiphany: maybe using their brain isn't such a bad idea after all. Who knew?
